mnkgame

Class MNKBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • mnkgame.MNKBoard

  • public class MNKBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Board for an (M,N,K)-game.

    The MNKBoard class allows only alternates moves between two players. It mantains the ordered list of moves and allows undoes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int K
      Number of symbols to be aligned (horizontally, vertically, diagonally) for a win
      int M
      Board rows
      int N
      Board columns

    • Constructor Detail

      • MNKBoard

        public MNKBoard(int M,
                int N,
                int K)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a board of size MxN and initialize the game parameters
        Parameters:
        M - Board rows
        N - Board columns
        K - Number of symbols to be aligned (horizontally, vertically, diagonally) for a win
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If M,N,K are smaller than 1

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the MNKBoard

      • cellState

        public MNKCellState cellState(int i,
                              int j)
                       throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the state of cell i,j
        Parameters:
        i - i-th row
        j - j-th column
        Returns:
        State of the i,j cell (FREE,P1,P2)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If i,j are out of matrix bounds

      • gameState

        public MNKGameState gameState()
        Returns the current state of the game.
        Returns:
        MNKGameState enumeration constant (OPEN,WINP1,WINP2,DRAW)

      • currentPlayer

        public int currentPlayer()
        Returns the id of the player allowed to play next move.
        Returns:
        0 (first player) or 1 (second player)

      • markCell

        public MNKGameState markCell(int i,
                             int j)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException,
                             java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Marks the selected cell for the current player
        Parameters:
        i - i-th row
        j - j-th column
        Returns:
        State of the game after the move
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If i,j are out of matrix bounds
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the game already ended or if i,j is not a free cell

      • unmarkCell

        public void unmarkCell()
                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Undoes last move
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If there is no move to undo

      • getMarkedCells

        public MNKCell[] getMarkedCells()
        Returns the marked cells list in array format.

        This is the history of the game: the first move is in the array head, the last move in the array tail.

        Returns:
        List of marked cells

      • getFreeCells

        public MNKCell[] getFreeCells()
        Returns the free cells list in array format.

        There is not a predefined order for the free cells in the array

        Returns:
        List of free cells
